name: actions-on-google
description: Actions on Google Client Library for Node.js
author: Google Inc.

scripts.build:clean: yarn clean:pack && yarn clean && yarn build
scripts.sync:facts-about-google:ts: cd sample/ts/app/facts-about-google/functions && rm -f *.tgz && cp ../../../../../*.tgz ./ && rm -rf node_modules yarn.lock package-lock.json && mv actions-on-google-v2*.tgz actions-on-google-v2.tgz && npm i
scripts.sync:name-psychic:ts: cd sample/ts/app/name-psychic/functions && rm -f *.tgz && cp ../../../../../*.tgz ./ && rm -rf node_modules yarn.lock package-lock.json && mv actions-on-google-v2*.tgz actions-on-google-v2.tgz && npm i
scripts.sync:facts-about-google:js: cd sample/js/app/facts-about-google/functions && rm -f *.tgz && cp ../../../../../*.tgz ./ && rm -rf node_modules yarn.lock package-lock.json && mv actions-on-google-v2*.tgz actions-on-google-v2.tgz && npm i
scripts.sync:name-psychic:js: cd sample/js/app/name-psychic/functions && rm -f *.tgz && cp ../../../../../*.tgz ./ && rm -rf node_modules yarn.lock package-lock.json && mv actions-on-google-v2*.tgz actions-on-google-v2.tgz && npm i
scripts.deploy:facts-about-google:ts: yarn package && yarn sync:facts-about-google:ts && cd sample/ts/app/facts-about-google/functions && yarn deploy
scripts.deploy:name-psychic:ts: yarn package && yarn sync:name-psychic:ts && cd sample/ts/app/name-psychic/functions && yarn deploy
scripts.deploy:facts-about-google:js: yarn package && yarn sync:facts-about-google:js && cd sample/js/app/facts-about-google/functions && yarn deploy
scripts.deploy:name-psychic:js: yarn package && yarn sync:name-psychic:js && cd sample/js/app/name-psychic/functions && yarn deploy
scripts.sample: yarn package && yarn sync:facts-about-google:ts && yarn sync:name-psychic:ts && yarn sync:facts-about-google:js && yarn sync:name-psychic:js
